channel.title: Of Machines and Men
channel.description: Recent content on Of Machines and Men

item.title: Thank you, Hugo Community!
item.description: Without the open-source software community, this website would not exist. Thank you so much for the help!

item.title: Somerset Art Group Photography Exhibition at YEAST Scrap Store
item.description: Yesterday, there was a photo exhibition by the Somerset Art Group. It is a group started by colleagues and good friends from Seetec-Pluss, and I was invited to help out and exhibit there. The above photos are a collage of my work that was exhibited, alongside many other, more talented, photographers.

item.title: Revisionist History- upcoming articles
item.description:
Revisionist History: upcoming articles

A list to cross off, to track articles that I’m adding here, and their chronology.

item.title: Work Experience
item.description: Today, I’m starting a work experience placement with the British Civil Service. This page is a temporary demo scratchpad to show off some ideas.

item.title: Cowboys & Aliens
item.description: I woke up early after dreaming a dream. Here’s the result:

item.title: The Queen's Platinum Jubilee
item.description: Who cares? Still, there’s a good song…

item.title: Work I've been doing
item.description:
I’ve been very quiet, haven’t I?

Pictured: boxed Star Wars Despecialized DVDs I made for a friend; only Star Wars (IV: A New Hope) was ready for 4th May 2022

item.title: Some Quick Notes on Phone Security
item.description: A friend recently contacted me with some techie questions about smartphone privacy. Security research is one of my obsessions, so I though it expedient to give a thorough answer.

item.title: Cactus the Green Hedgehog
item.description: My niece drew me a portrait of my puppet hedgehog.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello and welcome to my new website.

item.title: A Pilgrim's Progress, Retold
item.description: Audiobook. A retelling of John Bunyan’s famous allegory Pilgrim’s Progress, by Geraldine McCaughrean (illus. Jason Cockcroft), read by yours truly a few months ago, now republished here.

item.title: The Rhyme Bible
item.description: An audiobook, written by L. J. Sattgast, illustrated by Toni Goffe, read by Darren J. de Lima

item.title: Shakespeare Stories
item.description: Audiobook. A retelling of the Bard’s tales, by Leon Garfield (illus. Michael Foreman), read by yours truly.

item.title: Still ongoing
item.description: Of Machines and Men is still subject of ongoing work.
